summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackThe Good Molecules Hydrating Facial Cleansing Gel is gel infused with soothing Rosewater for a comfortable clean.
details: DetailsItem 2582311How To UseDispense one pump into palms and massage into dampened skin. Continue massaging until a light lather forms. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Avoid the eye area. To double cleanse, use as your second step after a cleansing balm or oil.IngredientsWater, Propanediol, Glycerin, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Coco-betaine, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Dehydroxanthan Gum, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Citric Acid, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Caprylyl Glyceryl Ether, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract.
how_to_use: Dispense one pump into palms and massage into dampened skin. Continue massaging until a light lather forms. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Avoid the eye area. To double cleanse, use as your second step after a cleansing balm or oil.

reviews.headline: Gentle on the Skin!
reviews.comments: This cleansing gel is gentle on my skin when I lather it on. It does not irritate my acne or cause more redness. It does not leave it dry and is perfect for the morning and night!

reviews.headline: Yes. I would repeat purchase.
reviews.comments: I really like the results

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: My sensitive skin loves it!

reviews.headline: Just what I was looking for
reviews.comments: This is a nice light cleanser that doesn't leave my skin feeling stripped or uncomfortable, but still makes me feel clean and refreshed! Great for what I needed for my combination skin.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Very good product I like

reviews.headline: Acne safe cleanser
reviews.comments:
This cleanser I have used for 1 year now and i can safely say it is Redness, Acne prone, dryness, and clogged pore free!! 

It's affordable, its simple, it's fragrance free! Love using this and will be a great cleaser for anyone

reviews.headline: so hydrating!!!
reviews.comments: I got a sample of this in a order i made and tried twice and immediately purchased a big one. this cleanser is so light and super hydrating. if you have dry skin and or mature skin I highly recommend trying.

reviews.headline: Loved so much that I had to repurchase.
reviews.comments: Leaves my skin clear and feeling fresh.

reviews.headline: SO EFFECTIVE
reviews.comments: It is the only that actually cleared my hormonal acne w/pit breaking me out.

reviews.headline: Didn't work for me
reviews.comments:
Did absolutely nothing for my skin used it for a month liked that its clean ingredients and didnt make my face dry really wanted it to work 
Wont be buying again.

reviews.headline: Very nice
reviews.comments: This face wash is perfect for my oily combo skin. Since I wear concealer I use peach and lily oil cleanser first, then this. Love it, not drying perfect balance for me.

reviews.headline: Dried out my skin
reviews.comments: I have been using the daily essentials kit and loving it, so i decided to try this. Suddenly my skin went from being hydrated to dried out. At first i thought the kit wasn't working for me anymore but then i realized it was the cleanser. I stopped using it and went back to just the daily essentials kit and my skin is soft again.

reviews.headline: Quickly Became My Go To!
reviews.comments: I've struggled to find an affordable yet effective facial cleanser, but I stumbled upon this about six months ago. Since then, I've fallen in love with it! It's gentle on my skin, but I can still tell it's thoroughly cleansing my face—without that tight, scrunchy feeling. I use it for both my AM and PM routines and will continue to do so because it's so hydrating!

reviews.headline: Non toxic product for a great price!
reviews.comments: This is gentle enough for my rosacea skin.  It didnt leave my face dry at all.

reviews.headline: MY HOLY GRAIL!!
reviews.comments: This was one of my first good molecules purchaces. It has been my holy grail for near 6-7 months now. I stumbled apon this brand when looking for a good, affordable, addative/ carginogen free skin cleanser. It has been so wonderful on my combonation skin through the winter, spring and the beginning heat of the summer to come. This is one of those products I continue to share with others because it really is that good!! As for the product itself its a clear gel cleanser which is very gentile on the skin. It does get bubbly but not sudsy. I use it in combation with various other good molecules products and it has kept my skin looking so very clear. Overall I love this product and its quality is uncomparable ! I reccommend to any and all !!

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: This is a great product. My face feels so smooth and clean.

reviews.headline: I loved it
reviews.comments: This product is amazing

reviews.headline: Clean Ingredients and Noticable Amazing Results
reviews.comments: I previously used a well-known face wash and moisturizer for years until I discovered that both contained endocrine disruptors, which mess with hormones. I did my research, found this brand, and gave it a try. For context, I used this face wash and the Good Molecules daily moisturizer twice a day (and nothing else) and within 4 days I could tell a noticable difference! I absolutely love it and my face feels very clean and soft!! A few notes: 1) a little bit goes a long way, which makes it pretty affordable; and 2) it doesn't foam/bubble up in the way most others work but that's due to the clean ingredients. While I found this product to contain clean/healthy ingredients and provide amazing results, I recommend everyone do their research on the ingredients within their skincare products and find what works best for them.

reviews.headline: Not For Oily Skin!
reviews.comments:
I wanted to love this cleanser, but unfortunately it did nothing for my oily skin. 
I started looking and feeling oily again within only an hour or two, whereas with my Alba Botanica cleanser, that does not happen for maybe close to 8 hours. I would be interested in trying an "oily skin friendly" version, as the cleanser's texture was pretty nice.

reviews.headline: Perfect gentle cleanser
reviews.comments: My skin is sensitive, and cleansers can easily leave my face bright red and irritated or dry- not this one!  This cleanser effectively cleanses my skin without redness or dryness. A little goes a long way and it comes in such a big tube that it is worth every penny!

media.caption: Healthy and Radiant Skin

media.headline: My Go To Cleansing Gel
media.caption: Glowy skin after using my Good Molecules Cleanser

faceoff_positive.comments: My skin can easily dry out, and this seems to keep my skin so even keel when I need some cleansing. It does exactly what it needs to! (Which sounds silly, but sometimes we can all wish cleansers had extra magical powers) It gently removes ALL my remaining makeup/sunscreen/etc. (after I oil cleanse/wipe), without over-stripping. It leaves my skin simply CLEAN, and ready for rejuvenation from my next steps --moisturizers and serums. I really don't have any "cons" for this, unless you want your cleanser to go above and beyond cleansing (though that seems like a tough game to play, and usually backfires when formulas try to do too much -- I always say, leave it to the treatments) And no over-drying means adult-acne-free for me (except for those couple of hormonal days haha but I wouldn't expect a cleanser to tackle that) :)
faceoff_positive.headline: Love this!

faceoff_negative.comments: When this cleanser came in a glass bottle it was my holy grail. A super simple and gentle cleanser that didn't dry my skin or cause any irritation but was still effective in a deep cleanse. When I saw they changed the packaging I didn't think too much of it but after buying I've found my face is super dry and breaking out like crazy. I didn't want to think it was this but I eliminated everything else and see some others saying they had a bad reaction to the new one. I'm so sad, this stuff was amazing.
faceoff_negative.headline: Changed the formula?
